summary.purpose: Barrel export file for the forms module that also defines ConfirmForm, DatePicker, and DatePicker2 components for confirmation dialogs and date range selection.
summary.problem_solved: Provides reusable form UI components including a confirmation dialog with approve/cancel buttons, a basic HTML date range picker, and an enhanced date range picker built on react-aria-components with calendar popover support.

external.name: react
external.usage: useState hook for loading state management

external.name: moment
external.usage: Date formatting for default date input values

external.name: lucide-react
external.usage: CalendarIcon for the DatePicker2 calendar trigger button

external.name: react-aria-components
external.usage: DatePicker, Dialog, Group, Label, Popover, Button, I18nProvider for accessible date picker UI in DatePicker2

external.name: @internationalized/date
external.usage: parseDate, today, getLocalTimeZone for date value parsing and defaults in DatePicker2

exports.description: Re-exports all exports from the ModularForm sub-module (ModularForm component, formElements, InternationalPhonePicker).

exports.name: ConfirmForm
exports.description: A confirmation dialog component with approve (green check) and cancel (red X) buttons, customizable headline, and RTL/LTR direction support.

exports.name: DatePicker
exports.description: A date range picker form component using native HTML date inputs with from/to fields and a submit button with loading state.

exports.name: DatePicker2
exports.description: An enhanced date range picker using react-aria-components with calendar popover, I18nProvider locale support, and accessible date input fields.

symbols.name: ConfirmForm
symbols.signature: ({ onV, onX, headline, direction, containerClassName, buttonsContainerClassName, headlineClassName, cancelButtonClassName, confirmButtonClassName, cancelButtonProps, confirmButtonProps, cancelElement, confirmElement }: ConfirmFormProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: A confirmation dialog component that renders a headline and two action buttons (confirm/cancel). Defaults to GreenVSvg and RedXSvg icons but supports custom elements. Supports RTL direction by default.

details.rendered_ui_description: A vertically stacked container with a bold headline at the top and a centered row of two buttons below: a cancel button (red X icon by default) and a confirm button (green check icon by default). The container is padded and supports RTL/LTR text direction.

symbols.name: DatePicker
symbols.signature: ({ submit, formClassName, labelsClassName, inputsClassName, buttonClassName, buttonStyle, defaultFrom, defaultTo, direction, fromText, toText, buttonText }: DatePickerProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: A simple date range form with native HTML date inputs for 'from' and 'to' dates. Includes a submit button with loading spinner state. Defaults to today's date using moment.js formatting.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal form row containing two labeled date inputs (from and to) with native browser date pickers, followed by a green submit button. Shows a spinning loader when the form is submitting.

symbols.name: DatePicker2
symbols.signature: ({ submit, formClassName, labelsClassName, inputsClassName, buttonClassName, calendarClassName, selectedDayClassName, todayDayClassName, buttonStyle, defaultFrom, defaultTo, direction, fromText, toText, buttonText }: DatePickerProps) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: An enhanced date range form using react-aria-components for accessible date pickers with calendar popovers. Wraps content in I18nProvider with en-GB locale. Supports calendar styling customization and direction-aware layout.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal form row with two labeled date pickers, each featuring a styled text date input with a calendar icon button that opens a popover calendar for date selection. Includes a green submit button with loading spinner state.
